effect.sun-moon: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.
